name: fdm_idex
before_layer_change_gcode:
; Before Layer Change >>>
; ----- layer_num: [layer_num]
{if layer_num == 0}M109 S[first_layer_temperature] C3 W1 ;wait for nozzle at first layer{endif}
G92 E0
; <<< Before Layer Change
template_custom_gcode:
; custom gcode
M104 S0 T0 ;turn off T0
M106 S0 P0 ;turn off fan
machine_start_gcode:
;***** Update  : 20230504
;***** Printer : [printer_preset]
;***** Profile : [print_preset]
;***** Plate   : [plate_name]
; ----- initial_extruder: [initial_extruder]
; ----- has_wipe_tower: [has_wipe_tower]
; ----- total_toolchanges: [total_toolchanges]
; ----- T0: {is_extruder_used[0]}
; ----- T1: {is_extruder_used[1]}
{if plate_name =~/.*IDEXDupl.*/ || plate_name =~/.*IDEXCopy.*/ }
  M605 S2 X162 R0 ;IDEX Duplication
{elsif plate_name =~/.*IDEXMirr.*/}
  M605 S3 ;IDEX Mirror
{elsif plate_name =~/.*IDEXBack.*/}
  M605 S4 ;IDEX Backup
{endif}

M82 ;absolute extrusion mode
M140 S[first_layer_bed_temperature] ;start warming bed

{if is_extruder_used[0]}M104 S{temperature_vitrification[0]} T0 ;preheat T0{endif}
{if is_extruder_used[1]}M104 S{temperature_vitrification[1]} T1 ;preheat T1{endif}
G28           ;home all axes
G1 Z10.0 F350 ;z raise

M190 S[first_layer_bed_temperature] ;wait for bed temperature
M109 S[first_layer_temperature] T[initial_extruder] ;wait for nozzle
M205 V5 ;Junction Deviation (mm)
{if 1==1}; LED
  M355 S1 P64
  G4 P100
  M355 S1 P128
  G4 P100
  M355 S1 P64
  G4 P200
  M355 S1 P255
  G4 P100
{endif}
{if 1==1}; Wipe
  G1 Z0.8 F500
  {if is_extruder_used[0]}M109 S{nozzle_temperature_initial_layer[0]} T0{endif}
  {if is_extruder_used[1]}M109 S{nozzle_temperature_initial_layer[1]} T1{endif}

  {if is_extruder_used[0]}T0
    G1 Z0.5 X0 Y-0.5 F6000        ;move to unsed front edge
    G92 E0
    G1 E{retraction_length[0] + 1} F1800 ;deretract
    G92 E0
    G1 X80 E16 F1200              ;deposit extrusion line
    G1 Z1 F6000                   ;lift
    G92 E0
    {if initial_extruder != 0}
      M104 S{temperature_vitrification[0]} ;standby
      G1 X-13 F6000
      M106 P0 S0 ;fan off
    {endif}
  {endif}
  {if is_extruder_used[1]}T1
    G1 Z0.5 X320 Y-0.5 F6000      ;move to unsed front edge
    G92 E0
    G1 E{retraction_length[1] + 1} F1800 ;deretract
    G92 E0
    G1 X240 E16 F1200             ;deposit extrusion line
    G1 Z1 F6000                   ;lift
    G92 E0
    {if initial_extruder != 1}
      M104 S{temperature_vitrification[1]} ;standby
      G1 X338 F6000
      M106 P1 S0 ;fan off
    {endif}
  {endif}
{endif}
{if initial_extruder > 0}T[initial_extruder] ;init toolhead{endif}
;===== ready
machine_end_gcode:
; End G-code >>>
;***** Update : 20230504
M140 S0 ;turn off bed
G92 E0  ;zero the extruder
G1 E-{retraction_length[current_extruder] + 1} F1800 ;retract
G1 Z{max_layer_z + 0.5} F1000 ;lift z a little
{if is_extruder_used[0]}T0
  M104 S0       ;turn off
  G0 X-20 F6000 ;park T0
  M106 S0       ;turn off fan
{endif}
{if is_extruder_used[1]}T1
  M104 S0       ;turn off
  G0 X340 F6000 ;park T1
  M106 S0       ;turn off fan
{endif}
G28 Z F120  ;home Z
G1 Y0 F3000 ;move to safe pos

M82 ;reset absolute extrusion mode
M84 ;disable motors
; <<< End G-code
;
; DON'T REMOVE these lines if you're using the smfix (https://github.com/macdylan/Snapmaker2Slic3rPostProcessor)
; min_x = [first_layer_print_min_0]
; min_y = [first_layer_print_min_1]
; max_x = [first_layer_print_max_0]
; max_y = [first_layer_print_max_1]
; max_z = [max_layer_z]
;
